name: Music Catch
description:
Catch the colorful shapes that appear when the music plays!

The task in Music Catch is very simple: use your finger to collect shapes. That's it! The more shapes you collect, the more points you get. Yellow shapes give you a bonus and multiply your points, but watch out for red shapes! Purple shapes are POWER! You'll have to discover on your own what the pulsing color shapes do...

Music Catch (version 1.0.1) includes four relaxing songs from Isaac Shepard's solo-piano albums:

* "Before Dawn" from "Swept Away"
* "Leaves in the Wind" from "Deep Joy"
* "Gentle" from "Deep Joy"
* "Letting Go" from "Deep Joy"

************

ADVANCED TIP: Want an extra challenge, or would you like to play co-op with a friend? Then try collecting shapes with two fingers at once.

************

Music Catch was developed by Reflexive Entertainment. Check out Reflexive's other games, including Airport Mania: First Flight and Ricochet Infinity!

************

SPECIAL NOTES: Apple's current operating system does not offer any way for games to use the music on your iPhone. Although OS3 will allow games to play music from your iPhone, we are unaware of any way that it will allow games to analyze the music data. For these reasons, Music Catch is unable to use your iPhone music during the game.
